review_data.title: Nie wieder
review_data.content: Die Qualität hat in letzter Zeit enorm nachgelassen. Zudem war im letzten Burger ein langes Haar im Fleisch!! Nie wieder!!!

review_data.title: Pommes so was von schlecht !
review_data.content: Burger gut aber auch teuer - pommes leider so was von schlecht. Lampig und ohne Geschmack - macht kein Spass...More

review_data.title: Juicy burger
review_data.content: I have visited this location at Hardbrücke numerous times. The staff are always helpful and efficient. There is a large seating area inside and out. The basic burger (12.90CHF) is made fresh and juicy each time. I ordered fries and a cold beer to accompany...More

review_data.title: Die besten Buregr der Stadt
review_data.content: Schönes Lokal, junge schnelle aufmerksame Bedienungen. Das essen kam schnell.Es war von hervorragender Qualität. Warm und nett serviert.>Keine Riesenkarte, ist...More

review_data.title: It is impossible to overhype this restaurant
review_data.content: I try not to overhype, but honestly one of the best burgers I've ever had. I had the chilli cheeseburger with chilli cheese fries, and I would highly recommend!!! staff were super helpful too, giving recommendations and being very chatty.

review_data.title: Best Burger!
review_data.content: Menu is small in size but my goodness it sure does make up for it in taste. No word of a lie the tastiest beef burger I've ever had. Would highly recommend, seated quickly on a busy Saturday night and the staff member was superb!

review_data.title: Love this burger!!!
review_data.content: One of the best places to find the best burger in Zurich!!! Service is very helpful and pleasant!!! I recommended for sure!! Go and try...

review_data.title: Nice lunch experience 🍔😀
review_data.content: We were at this place for a lunch. The staff was friendly and helpful. The burger was very good and tasty 😋🍔 We had to wait for our meal. It was a bit noisy as the place was crowded at lunch. Highly recommended 👍🏼 😀

review_data.title: Fresh, tasty burger
review_data.content: I had the chance to check out the newest addition to the Burgermeister franchise at Hardbrucke (Escherwyss). Open about four months ago under not much fanfare, the former business located at this address was Studer’s restaurant. This new Burgermeister has lots of sidewalk seating and...More
